title: error: internal compiler error: broken MIR

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body: ### Meta cargo +stable does not show this. `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-nightly (101fa903b 2023-06-04) ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling rkyv v0.6.7 Compiling plotters v0.3.4 error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in Item(DefId(0:1502 ~ rkyv[9515]::std_impl::{impl#47}::deserialize)) (after phase change to runtime-optimized) at bb0[27]: Field projection `(*_19).1` specified type `u32`, but actual type is `<[::Archived] as ArchivePointee>::ArchivedMetadata` --> /home/andy/.cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-6f17d22bba15001f/rkyv-0.6.7/src/lib.rs:765:77 | 765 | ptr_meta::from_raw_parts(self.raw_ptr.as_ptr(), T::pointer_metadata(&self.metadata)) | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_const_eval/src/transform/validate.rs:354:30 0: ::emit_diagnostic 1: ::delay_span_bug:: 2: ::fail:: 3: ::visit_place 4: ::run_pass 5: rustc_mir_transform::optimized_mir 6: rustc_query_impl::plumbing::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::> 7: >::call_once 8: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>, false, false, false>, rustc_query_impl::plumbing::QueryCtxt, false> 9: rustc_query_impl::query_impl::optimized_mir::get_query_non_incr::__rust_end_short_backtrace 10: ::encode_crate_root 11: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata_impl 12: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 13: rustc_metadata::fs::encode_and_write_metadata 14: rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen 15: ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result, rustc_span::ErrorGuaranteed>> 16: ::ongoing_codegen 17: ::enter::, rustc_span::ErrorGuaranteed>> 18: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_span::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{c losure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_span::ErrorGuaranteed>> 19: <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_span::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core:: result::Result<(), rustc_span::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 20: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/101fa903bb9209d270086da279247625a2869211/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1985:9 21: as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once at /rustc/101fa903bb9209d270086da279247625a2869211/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1985:9 22: std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start at /rustc/101fa903bb9209d270086da279247625a2869211/library/std/src/sys/unix/thread.rs:108:17 23: 24: error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in Item(DefId(0:1502 ~ rkyv[9515]::std_impl::{impl#47}::deserialize)) (after phase change to runtime-optimized) at bb3[29]: Field projection `(*_37).1` specified type `u32`, but actual type is `<[::Archived] as ArchivePointee>::ArchivedMetadata` --> /home/andy/.cargo/registry/src/index.crates.io-6f17d22bba15001f/rkyv-0.6.7/src/lib.rs:765:77 | 765 | ptr_meta::from_raw_parts(self.raw_ptr.as_ptr(), https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.72.0-nightly (101fa903b 2023-06-04) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `rkyv` (lib) warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
